cause.description:
the bank street school in new york is trying to raise 13,000 dollars to build a school for middle school childeren. $13,000 will be enough for the construction and to hire teachers. it will come equiped with computors and internet access, blackboards, and other important and assential learning tools.
if anyone has anything to add, please feel free to make a discusion.
1. everyone is entitled to a education
cause.mission: raise enough money($13,000) to build a school in cambodia
cause.name: Cambodia childerens education
